website_summaries.verdict: Tanning lotion with an instant bronzer that leaves smooth results.
pros: Results are noticeable after one or two uses
Doesn't leave streaks or orange coloring
cons: After tanning, it leaves a scent that some users find unpleasant

customer_reviews.title: Snow White to Bronze Beauty
customer_reviews.text: I went to the tanning bed for 6 days in a row at 10 min each session! This tanning lotion let me get from Snow White to a bronze beauty so quickly! It has a nice brown tone, NO orange at all which is great for someone so pale like myself! And it has a pleasant smell! Make sure you leave it on for 3+ hours after you tan before taking a shower tho!
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Don't use if you look like casper
customer_reviews.text: All the idiots posting pictures of their stained hands, have no business even using a bronzer. They are so pasty white and need to work up to this product, if at all. Great product if you tan well.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love that I come out of the tanning bed smelling like the tanning lotion rather than burnt skin. It's really easy to apply, I was worried that my hands would be discolored but that hasn't happened (yet). Great product for the price, would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the buy if you're looking for fast results!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this item a few times before but never online and I was not disappointed! This product serves up fast results. After only 2 12 minute sessions in the bed, I show major results! You do need to bring wet wipes to wipe your hands off because it does create a "stain" in the web of your fingers and if you have any dead skin on your password, it will discolor them as well. A little goes a VERY long way so use sparingly.
customer_reviews.author: Tee_Oh_Gee

customer_reviews.title: Crap in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what’s in this this bottle but it’s not lotion that should be doing this.This happened after I applied it to the back of my legs.I noticed it after I got out of the tanning bed.It’s been two weeks and it’s still there.
customer_reviews.author: Brayden

customer_reviews.title: I was worried about the staining between the fingers like I had read on some other reviews
customer_reviews.text: This product made all the difference. I used some other products in the past without even close to the results that I get using this. I was worried about the staining between the fingers like I had read on some other reviews, but this wasn't a problem for me. Apply a lot and make sure that you QUICKLY rub it in as well as you can. The results are incredible! I won't buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: WineMixxer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lotion. I also use high pressure beds so they have a lot to do with my color, but I haven’t had any issues with it leaving streaks or anything like that. I think it’s great for the price. I posted a before and after pic since using the lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Harrison

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This leaves u very streaky and orange. Terrible product. I'll never buy outside of a tanning salon again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Konapelsky

customer_reviews.title: Love it: )
customer_reviews.text: I don't tan very well. It usually takes a couple weeks to get myself from pale to a darker shade of pale. I've used this twice already and I can already see a difference. Love it :)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Big bottle comes out nice I just wish it smelled more Fruity Tooty but ...
customer_reviews.text: Big bottle comes out nice I just wish it smelled more Fruity Tooty but it does have a nice scent and I think all the haters out there that post negative comments are people that just are concerned that you're not buying from their tanning salon they keep on saying oh no don't buy from Amazon you're getting fake stuff well I bought for myself then it's just like the stuff in the salon folks but 1/3 the price
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not as fresh as should be
customer_reviews.text: Product must be a slightly old this product normally smells very strong and amazing. It was also a bit on the runny side. It is normally thick and and moisturizing. However the bottle I received is sticky and thin in texture. I am sure that it is normal when a company buys in such large quantities that it’s easy to receive older product at times. I won’t be purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: The buyer of the clothes

customer_reviews.title: Horrible tanning lotion.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd buy some salon suntan lotion for an affordable price. It seems the prices in the tanning salons are ridiculously expensive. This looked like a decent brand from reading the reviews. I used it a week a go and again today in level 111 tanning bed. I asked the store owner if it was a good brand, because I have been disappointed with the results thus far. He said the product was discontinued almost 2 years ago! There is no expiration date so I have no idea how old it is. You get what you pay for as the saying goes. Learned my lesson the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Go4it

customer_reviews.title: I love this lotion
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for several years and bought multiple bottles of this lotion. I will have to say, this is by far my favorite lotion I've ever used. It smells really nice and it helps me tan quickly. I have never had the orange issue between my fingers, but I do try to wash my hands when I'm finished putting on the lotion, or at least rub it in really good on your hands. I will continue to buy this lotion. I would definitely recommend this lotion if you are looking for a quick start to tanning. It only takes a few sessions in the sun to notice a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Zsamee

customer_reviews.title: I bought this and used it one time and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and used it one time and I have sensitive skin but have NEVER had a reaction to tanning lotion before. I broke out in the most awful looking rash you’ve ever seen. I had a completely allergic reaction to this and I’ve never had any problems with any tanning lotions even from Walmart. So I don’t know what’s in this but it didn’t work for me skin. I burned and couldn’t tan for a week to get the rash to go away. I returned it the same day. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Gives a real tan not orange
customer_reviews.text: After reading some reviews I was a little worried I would turn an orange or fake tan color after applying this and much to my relief I don’t! I’ve used this 5 times now and don’t notice any sort of left over residue besides in your finger crevices but if you wash your hands it will go away just fine! I’ve also noticed that this lotion helps me tan much easier than on my own! I usually fry to a crisp with no lotion so this is such a great help! Like I said I’ve gone 5 times now and I can see a nice golden tan starting! I would definitely recommend this especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I used this for 2 weeks, 4 times each week, 7-10 minutes each time. I had no color change at all. It worked more like sunscreen (lightbulb-screen in the tanning bed), it prevented any tanning. I switched to a different lotion I got at the salon and my first time I was several shades darker. This did not work for me
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Williamson

customer_reviews.title: NOT fake,.. Love this lotion!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and the price! Was using a lotion with no bronzer and after a few tans with this lotion, I am finally seeing results. Smells great, soft and was super fast free shipping... to the people who are complaining that this is "fake", I honestly don't feel that it's fake, and IF it is, it's the best "fake" lotion I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.author: Its me

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite products I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Okay I definitely had to write a review on this product I can with a membership constantly I have a pigmentation issue with my skin so I lighten really fast and I darken just as fast so I have to tan consistently to keep my color I think it's due to genetics in my breeding, I've spent a lot of money on tanning lotions and I have spent up to 85 $200 on lotions before this product for the price works better than anything else I have boughten. It even Works outside if you tan... but phenomenal in a tanning bed definitely recommend will use this forever
customer_reviews.author: ty

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for tanning in a bed but decided to try it outside. In less than an hour I got nice color! Mind you I'm fairly light and can't rely on the sun to tan my legs- so it's either spray tan or bed tanning. What mom has an infinite amount of time to lay out in the sun? Not me.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not again
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't happy with product at all. After first use I looked like I'd used BAD self tanner. Left me orange and nasty
customer_reviews.author: Jenz

customer_reviews.title: Best lotion I've used, and I've tried numerous
customer_reviews.text: I have used numerous tanning lotions. This is the BEST. This one, and the 50x one. It doesnt leave a residue. It doesn't leave you with "I just tanned" smell. It has an amazing consistency-rubs on smooth. It is also one of the few lotions that works amazingly, and let's you go about your day after tanning-with other lotions, they would leave me with a gross residue making me have to shower after tanning. This stuff is amazing. Makes tanning tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Power

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - Be Careful of Streaking
customer_reviews.text: I'll preface this by saying I do not tan often, usually fewer than once per year. However, I needed to get rid of some really pesky tan lines from outdoor running. This is a really nice product - great smell, very moisturizing and I got the best tan of my life, BUT - be sure to really, really rub it in. It definitely streaks but if you rub it in very well, you shouldn't have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay T. Blum

customer_reviews.title: Knock off? Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I tan real easy and like a deep bronze tan. I thought with the great reviews that I would try this one. I have not seen this tanning lotion do anything. It leaves a smell later even after washing off. Not impressed at all. Read someone else's review it was discontinued, so does that mean I purchased an item that has expired and that is why it no longer is good? Not sure if Amazon will take it back but it was wasted money. I was doing better to not use anything and get a good tan. Absolutely no results other than the odor.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually buy tanning products, but my 14 year old daughter was begging me to get some. I bought this as a recommendation from her. I was suppose to buy (Paint It Black?!), but I was confused and bought this instead. I must say... I love this stuff. It got my legs pretty dark and those stubborn things never want to tan. You don’t even need to use very much. I sat outside, but this stuff would do wonders indoor tanning. It does turn your hands orange a little, so washing it off would help.
customer_reviews.author: Kaydance

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try a cheaper tanning product because the one I usually buy is $55. This was a HORRIBLE idea. After reading so many positive reviews I decided to try this. I have streaks and dark spots all over! I have never ever had this problem before I did apply it evenly I just think that this product is CHEAP quality. I am very disappointed because now I look crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Rey De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like reviews stains orange streaks even when blended well and ...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like reviews stains orange streaks even when blended well and does not get dark fast just leaves orange blotches
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No bronzer in my bottle :(
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bummed! I checked this lotion out for a week before deciding to purchase it, considering I’d spent $60 on 2 Ed hardy lotions recently. Most of the bad reviews were based on the bronzer being to dark and that’s something I wanted in a lotion. So I decided to take the leap. Well that’s my only complaint with this lotion. And it a massive let down to me. My skin tone don’t change after applying the lotion or after tanning like it does with my Ed Hardy Butter me brown. I’m super disappointed. It’s literally like my bottle contains zero bronzer.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Solid Black gets a solid 💯👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Ok I was super skeptical buying indoor tanning lotion online let’s be honest, but I’m like so shook over this! I cannot believe how awesome of a bronzer this is! I have some Designer Skin lotion right now - cost over 100$ and trust me it’s the 💣 BUT I wasn’t looking to spend that again so I did my research and Solid Black was #1 on every list. Now I know why! Smells good, goes on nice, definitely a hardcore bronzer and definitely a very nice surprise for me 🖤 my absolute new favorite!!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Frizzell

customer_reviews.title: I’ll buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the bad reviews were talking about. If you’ve used a bronzer before, you should know what you’re getting. There’s nothing crazy about this one. I wouldn’t recommend any of them if you’re pasty white, probably need to get some color before you add a bronzer or expect weird results. Even still, just stick with it at that point lol It works well for me and much more affordable than the salons. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: SCGAMECOCKGIRL81

customer_reviews.title: Favorite tanning lotion
customer_reviews.text: I love this tanning lotion. It’s the only one I’ll use now. Gives you the perfect tan quickly. I’ve used many others and barely notice a difference in my tan. I repurchases this one because I remembered liking it the last time I had used it. Noticed a huge difference by the next day. Smells great too!
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: I ordered through prime and it came a day early which was a HUGE plus! Not to mention this stuff smells like absolute heaven!! Its SUPER moisturizing and I already have a bronzed glow after one use. I am half Italian with olive skin so I do tan easy but my skin throughout the year is on the lighter side for the most part (usually dont gwt mich sun) so I started tanning in beds again and I fell in love!! This stuff is great. I think the smell is good for men and women as well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan w

customer_reviews.title: I'll use it until it's gone because it's a fine product but it really does not aid in deeper ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tanning lotion based solely on the reviews. I tan on a weekly basis. When I first used this, I thought wow I am already darker! I quickly realized this was only due to the bronzer. After a few days, the bronzer washes off and you are not any darker. If you are someone who tans multiple times per week, I can see how it would appear as if you were darker. Once the bronzer is washed away, I have the same level of tan as I did with a drugstore lotion. I'll use it until it's gone because it's a fine product but it really does not aid in deeper tanning, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, But Still Orange
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I’d say it definitely did help me get darker faster. Unfortunately, it does leave the dreaded “fake” orangish color. It’s not terrible, but it’s definitely noticeable enough for people to notice & even mention to you. I would still say it’s better than some other ones out there, and I might even buy again, but I won’t use it consistently. Maybe I’ll go back & forth between products so the orange doesn’t build too much.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Flash black from Walmart is better than this one
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different tanning lotions. This tanning lotion turned me orange in my creases and in between my boobs and different places. It turned orange after taking for 40 minutes out in the sun. I would not advise this one. It did not get my darker. Flash black from Walmart is better than this one. I returned it and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OH. MY. GOSH.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I literally just got undressed to take a shower and had to stop to write this review. YALLLLLLLL. I used this for the first time last night (was literally in the tanning booth for 3 minutes) and I notice a difference. ONE. USE. I am AMAZED. I’m not a huge advocate for tanning beds, but I wanted just a little boost for the summer, whih is why I went in for such a short time. And just that little bit gave me something. I will take a picture in the sun in a little bit and use that as a before picture (because I really didn’t think it would work this well) WILL UPDATE IN A WEEK.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kraemer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Smelled great, dried down quickly and was effective! Spent 3 hours at the lake with this on and got a good tan! For reference I had no tan lines on my back prior to this. I did get sunburnt and I have some peeling on my back, but I also forgot to put on sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: Tans fast and dark
customer_reviews.text: Incredible. After only 2 sessions using it I was clearly darker, had to back off of using too frequently. Bought it due to an upcoming trip with only a few days to prepare and tan for. More than met my needs. I had no problems with the "orange" color you may see in other posts. I expect it is something some skin tones may experience, but not me.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket0455

customer_reviews.title: My Review
customer_reviews.text: I am not familiar with tanning lotion but this one was most mentioned. I have been in the tanning bed three times, 10 minute 15 minutes and 20 minutes . The first go round I didn’t know you had to rub it in so I got white and tan patches everywhere! No big deal lol But my second third time tanning I made sureTo apply it properly and you can’t even tell that I made the mistake the first time because it’s all even now it does leave stains on your hands if you’re not able to wash them immediately. All in all this product is pretty awesome smells amazing that works great!
customer_reviews.author: Heather831

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Purchased from seller "beauty 4 less" I believe this lotion is a fake as it did not work not one single bit. Stick with buying elsewhere and with reputable outlets. I've used this lotion several times in a 13 minute bed and ZERO color change. It's almost like it prevented me from tanning and worked more like a sun screne. Super disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: nikki piper

customer_reviews.title: holy grail lotion!!!
customer_reviews.text: Solid Black by Millennium is the best tanning lotion i’ve ever used. I have probably tried almost every lotion out there. I am extremely fair skinned and I could see a noticible difference after one 10 minute session. I have now tanned for 5 sessions and I am so incredibly dark. The smell isn’t the best, but it is so worth it. I do recommend wiping the area between fingers after applying, as it sometimes gets uneven there. Overall, the best tanning lotion i’ve ever used at an unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I am really satisfied with this product. I have spends several hundred dollars on tanning lotions from the salon over the past couple of years and I have to say this one is better than 99% of the ones I have purchased. I do not like have that "burnt" smell after tanning and this lotion gives a nice scent after tanning. Give a nice tan color, not orange look. You can beat the price and it definitely exceeded my expectations of the product. You won't be disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great for tanning those hard-to-tan spots
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying a bronzing lotion that isn’t straight up a self tanner and I love the outcome! I generally tan easily but my back never seems to get as dark as the front. I applied this product and after 30-40m in the sun I had defined tanlines! Smells great too, has a bit of a ‘manly’ but I tend to like that scent. Even my pale husband doesn’t mind using it!
customer_reviews.author: The Browns

customer_reviews.title: Top review from a fair skinned tanner.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very fair skinned but can tan nicely over time. I started tanning May this year and only started using this accelerator yesterday. The lotion I was using before did pretty much nothing to help my tan along, but this one having the bronzer in it looks amazing. There were some very light streaks on my leg and a spot on the top of my foot but that was definitely user error and I actually scrubed it away in the shower the next morning. Make sure to rub it in all the way and you wont have that problem. It gave my skin that nice extra bronze boost without being obvious or orange. I would recommend this accelerator to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Jill Bright

customer_reviews.title: Tanning lotion with self-tanner
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but the extra bronze works more like a self-tanner and washes off in the shower. So, in reality it works about as well as other tanners, but the self tan is nice. The smell is okay and it dries quickly. Make sure you wash your hands, because it will stain them.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work okay.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a super regular with tanning. I do use this every time to keep my skin moisturized. It has a smell, but it's not overwhelming. I am very light skinned and it doesn't leave me streaky. I haven't burned using this and there is no tingle effect. I don't expect much from a tanning lotion, just trying to protect my fair skin while trying to gradually get a tan.
customer_reviews.author: KimTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great tanning product!
customer_reviews.text: I use an indoor tanning bed to combat life-time psoriasis. I have to be careful what product I use as most tanning products cause a psoriasis break-out. I have successfully used this product for years without a break-out. The Solid Black tanning lotion is moisturizing and has a pleasant scent. I highly recommend this tanning product!
customer_reviews.author: Seeking Him

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like the smell and prefer more expensive brands
customer_reviews.text: It works, but it smells a bit and you have to use way more than other brands to cover the body. It gets used up quickly, not sure how that works but it certainly does take more to cover the same area. For how much you have to use it seems to come out to the same cost/value for the better brands and the other ones don’t have that bronzing smell. Maybe I’m just sensitive to it..
customer_reviews.author: J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! I really love this lotion!! I used it one time yesterday(outside) and the difference! Its smells good, goes on really easy, not gummy, thick, or sticky. I would definitely recommend using a body scrub to get all the dead skin off your body first. That will help the product go on smoother and shouldn't streak. I will definitely be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie P

customer_reviews.title: The good thing is that I didn't really get that odd ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I just expected to get darker with this. I used the 60X in the past and that worked well, so logically, with 100X I thought I'd get a lot darker. I got a little darker, I suppose. The good thing is that I didn't really get that odd orange color like I did with another type I have used. I was careful with my hands & fingernails, but never had an issue like I had with that other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: bronze
customer_reviews.text: I brought this item, my sister told me about it and the color she got from it.I started using this item before the tanning salons open. I used it outside,the third day i had so much color to me.so far I used it indoor salon, to me I got more color by sitting out side. I think is item is worth the time and money, I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: DEN

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about purchasing this item because of the reviews because they said it will leave stains and orange blotches...well i went to put it on and it was literally like lotion lol no color whatsoever and after an hour of tanning outside it did nothing almost like its a sunscreen or something...so be warned this product does not work & they probably replaced it with something other than the actual product.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay McAlister

customer_reviews.title: OK lotion
customer_reviews.text: Designer Skin is the lotion wife and I prefer and use in our bed. I bought this for the price and reading reviews thought it would be decent. Lotion does not color us like DS lotion. Lotion has gone to the back of our stock pile and gets used on occasion to change it up. Cheap price, may work better for some, just not results I expected for us
customer_reviews.author: BONES

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS LOTION!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this lotion leading up to prom last year and loved how I got such an amazing bronze glow. Now that I am tanning again this year, I purchased it again and is ecstatic about the results I'm seeing. If you want a fast-acting bronzing lotion that is noticeable in a matter of days this is a great product for you! Can't beat it for the price either... :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H.

customer_reviews.title: Great tan,great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice tanning lotion,great price and it does not turn your Palm of your hands orange!!Nice deep tan!!No tingle!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracyc

customer_reviews.title: Color So Much Faster
customer_reviews.text: I've been tanning 3 times in the last week and a half and already have a great tan!! Before I was going SOOO many more times to get even a bit of tanning and that was WITH the super expensive tanning lotions they peddle in the tanning salons. I was worried about streaking or orange palms with this from other reviews and I haven't had a problem at all. Great product for a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: AmandaO

customer_reviews.title: Great beach tan for olive complexion.
customer_reviews.text: I use this at the beach. I’m Italian and have an olive complexion this no spf lotion is great! I have a perfect tone to my tan now. I’m sold for the long term on it
customer_reviews.author: Pie-Air76

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice and no tingle!
customer_reviews.text: While modeling a couple years back, I used a variety of tanning lotions to get the color my photographer was looking for. This was the one I used most often and was the most satisfied with. The smell is nice and it never made my skin red or tingly. Though everyone may react differently to every lotion, maybe give this one a try!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Not as dark as I thought
customer_reviews.text: I have used this tanning lotion. I could not tell if it even works. It is not as dark as I thought. The impression I had was it would help to make me more tanned. I could have bought the same thing at WalMart. I am giving it 5 stars for moisturizing, 3 stars for scent, but no stars for the value of money, sorry. I will continue to use it to see if I have any better results because it is the first of October.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Fail

customer_reviews.title: #1 go to lotion
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite tanning lotion my #1 go to. I have used a lot of Millennium lotions and Designer Skin buy this is my favorite. Your tan lasts for weeks and it doesn’t leave my skin looking orange. The scent is ok and after tanning it still smells ok. Goes on creamy and doesn’t feel sticky or heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this indoor tanning lotion
customer_reviews.text: I love this indoor tanning lotion, it arrived safely packed and in great condition. It will leave you with a beautiful bronze tan. The smell is very nice, not over powering. The price is amazing . The tanning salons around town price for this is 55-60 dollars . You'll be happy with this product !
customer_reviews.author: Susan Paitself

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results and smells great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. I tan really well but wanted a little help to get a tan fast for my wedding. Using this lotion I only needed to go 6 sessions at 12 mins each to get results that would usually take me months. I apply the lotion an hour before I tan and leave it on about 3 hours after.
customer_reviews.author: Jaide

customer_reviews.title: You can probably find a better lotion
customer_reviews.text: It is okay, I would say for a new indoor tanner this would work/ or someone on the more fair side. I am darker naturally and have been indoor/ outdoor tanning for a while, so this product did not work that well for me. It did, however, keep me moisturized in the tanning bed. Definitely do your research before buying this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Alethea Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Ive only used it once so far, but I feel like I noticed a pretty dramatic difference! I’m really enjoying this product, and it smells nice. It’s a little strong at first but it fades away after it’s on. It smells like summer.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Cantle

customer_reviews.title: this tanning lotion really does give you amazing color! I can't comment on if it's the ...
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, this tanning lotion really does give you amazing color! I can't comment on if it's the "real deal" because I've never bought it from the tanning salon but either way this stuff is amazing. Smells pretty decent, leaves your skin feeling nourished, and gives you a great dark tan. Previously, I was using Designer Skin Elusive which is a great tanning lotion but significantly more expensive. Solid Black is a fraction of the price and gives you an even darker, deeper tan. Will definitely purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Does not add color
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used dozens of self tanning products over the last 20 years, and every once in a while I’ll pick a new one to try based on reviews, and this lotion simply did not work. It smells good and feels good and does not work. I did not get any noticeable color. Maybe it was a batch problem, but I won’t be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Works, but leaves streaks
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many lotions, and yes, this works , but be careful, since this leaves streaks. I already had a base tan, and it deepened and got more brown with this lotion, BUT I still got streaks. I personally didn't have an orange tan, as some of the people did, and to avoid the staining between my fingers and on my palms, I cleaned the lotion off with a wet towel.
customer_reviews.author: Janka

customer_reviews.title: Good color
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to enhance my tanning. I was looking for something that would give me a nice quick color without the tingling. It does give a nice color looks like a natural tan. The only two things I don't like about it are the smell and if you don't wipe your fingers off really well before you tan or wash your hands immediately afterwards it does streak in between your fingers. Otherwise it does exactly what I needed to do
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT a fan of the smell!
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay lotion and will get you dark. You definitely need a base tan before using it and it will leave staining in between your fingers if you don't wash your hands after applying. The biggest drawback is the smell. I'm definitely not a fan. It smells like a men's tanning lotion mixed with vanilla frosting or something. Bleh. I suppose I would buy it again if I can't find something better on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Brydi HK

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing results, major retail stores have better
customer_reviews.text: I never ordered a tanning lotion online. I tried this one because I was sick of paying for the lotion at most tanning salons. I never saw results that would have me order it again. I've purchased better indoor tanning bed lotions in major retail stores for 9.99 that were far better. I also noticed the added bronzers or gradual tan that it delivers fades and "spots" a lot faster than your home self tan sprays in a can. I live in Florida and do not sunbathe outside, it's too hot for me. I keep a nice sunkissed look by using better products than this. This was a disappointing purchase, for me.
customer_reviews.author: anne l.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I used this about twice a week. I only use a little bit each time. It seem to work better if you use is sparelinly versus pouring it on and rubbing it in. I get great results and the cost here on Amazon is so much better than at the tanner store
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Several shades darker after tanning once and very moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: Noticable difference in the quality of my tan when using this versus nothing. Tan is deeper, lasts longer and my skin is moisturized for the whole day. Smells great, isn't sticky and doesn't stain hands or nails.
customer_reviews.author: Sk

customer_reviews.title: Designer tanning lotion without the tanning salon high price!
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this today but when I got this I posted a picture of it on FB and I got a lot of comments saying how good this stuff is. It smells decent not the best smelling tanning lotion, but I'm more about how good it works! Lol. I've only went tanning 2 xs so far and I've already got a tan line... Plus this is got 100xs bronzer and was only $25, at the tanning salon designer lotion like this runs anywhere from 50 to $100 a bottle. This is way worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Smells Awful
customer_reviews.text: I am SO disappointed! I spent about an hour reading the product description s and reviews of all of the top selling indoor tanning lotions online here. I settled on this one because it had excellent reviews oh, several of which mentioned the great fragrance. I just returned mine, because this stuff smells awful! I could not get the smell out of my nose hours after tanning and even after showering and it was far from a pleasant aroma. I felt like everyone around me could smell the worst tanning lotion smell. Definitely do not recommend and would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey varga

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional! ♥️♥️♥️
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years. I only tan for a month prior to summer. I've used many different tanning lotions. I've never had any issues with this product. If you wash or wipe your hands immediately ( especially in between fingers) , they will NOT discolor. I have a olive complextion, and within 2 sessions with this lotion, I'm Golden Brown. Within 10 sessions I'm beautifully dark. Love, Love, Love!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Wash yours hands with something after applying.
customer_reviews.text: Really love this product! Gets you darker much quicker without so many tanning sessions. Definitely bring wipes or something to wash your hands after applying though because it will turn your hands color. Otherwise no complaints, smells good and isn’t greasy. Definitely recommend for anyone who has a very fair complexion. I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this definitely gives me the tan I've been trying to get with previous lotions. It seems like it gives me the results quicker. I do however take a paper towel and wipe in between my fingers because I'm scared they'll turn orange as other reviewers have mentioned, lol .
customer_reviews.author: Lynsi

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product June 12th and received it on June 14th, so shipping was very quick. I have used this product only 2 times thus far and I am very pleased. I did read the reviews prior to purchase so I have taken the advice of previous reviewers and I am applying with gloves on and in advance prior to going to the tanning bed. I am already able to see a significant difference. I am as dark as if I had been in the sun all summer. I will be purchasing again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: derena bradley

customer_reviews.title: Orange on fair skin tones
customer_reviews.text: This is a great affordable tanning lotion. I’m extremely fair and it really helped jumpstart my color for the summer. My only complaint is the bronzer does get streaky and splotchy if you don’t rub it in enough so be careful. It also tends to look a little orange so i prefer to alternate between this lotion and a non-bronzer lotion to make it look more natural and less like a spray tan. It smells like every generic tanning lotion, nothing special or bad either. I probably will try a different lotion for my next purchase but this one is good for now.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Chatagnier

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to tan short term for a trip. I stopped tanning regularly 6 years ago because you know, I wasn’t 20 anymore and realized cancer kills. But compared to the higher priced stuff you can get, this stuff isn’t good. You get what you pay for, as always.
customer_reviews.author: Serious Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! No nasty door, it’s actually pleasant. I started using it two weeks ago and already have an amazing tan. Some days I apply it and never make it to my pool, but still continue to develop a nice color. Will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: The Dog Mother

customer_reviews.title: It’s works average. Fast shipping and has 33oz
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright. I would’ve gotten a different lotion for the price if I could return after opening it. Not sure if I could have dine that or not. It’s an average bronzer nothing spectacular m, it’s an ok lotion but had fast shipping and you get a lot of lotion it’s 33oz
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ames

customer_reviews.title: Left brown streaks on me
customer_reviews.text: I used gloves to put it on and I'm glad I did because it left brown streaks on my arms and legs. I've used it before and I don't remember this happening. Maybe the formula is different now??? Anyways, it was obvious and very streaky.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell, really great for tanning in the sun too.
customer_reviews.text: I think this product might be made for tanning beds but I really like it for summer time. The smell is also great and I havent experienced hand-dying issue like I saw in the reviews. Maybe that only happens in a tanning bed. I love my glow from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Nalty

customer_reviews.title: Comes off in the shower
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this works really well if you want instant color BUT im wondering if those people giving it 5 stars even shower because the color comes right off if you exfoliate in the shower, even 24 hours after It’s been applied.. That “instant color” is because this product acts like a tinted tanning lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Marzena

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I am super pail. Like I’ve been tanning for 2 months and have gotten 0 results. I love this lotion, but the color doesn’t last. It makes me look dark within a few hours of getting out of the tanning bed, but after I shower it’s gone. I like to use it when I’m going somewhere so I don’t look like a ghost. I’ve used it numerous times and have only experienced streaking twice, but I blame myself for that not the product.
customer_reviews.author: Liz N

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE READ
customer_reviews.text: Gives you a nice color but here’s the thing, it’s not just an expediter it’s also a self tanner. Before using it for the booth make sure you go easy on your hands, feet, knees and elbows. Scrub when you get home. The color was nice afterwards but I was a little more orange than I like. Smelled like a typical self tanner afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️Buy this lotion!!
customer_reviews.text: I had very fair/porcelain skin, went tanning with this lotion and within four 9 minute sessions I was very Dark! Buy this stuff and in a week you can be very tan! Love this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Dellinger

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This lotion was really good! When I tanned, i got dark REALLY fast which was the goal. It does have bronzer in it, so one thing I have to say is BE CAREFUL when you apply it. Make sure you rub it in all the way and wipe your hands off when you're done, because it will be splotchy if you dont. The only places I dealt with splotchiness was on my hands and the inside of my arms because I wasnt careful. I'll purchase this again when I go tanning
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Rice

customer_reviews.title: Self tanner for tanning bed.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely self tanner. Will go a bit orange. Scent smells like any other coco butter product. Then turns self tanner scent. Good if you want a tanner. Not great if you would rather build and not worry about streaking or patches.
customer_reviews.author: Bama

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: The bronzer works great in this lotion! Be very careful to spread evenly because it will streak you bad. Also wash your hands! I wont use this one anymore tho....it has an orange-ish color to it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Leaving my Skin Burnt and Dry - Not Tan
customer_reviews.text: I've been tanning at the same salon for the past few years, so I've used several different brands of tanning lotions before. I recently just started going again to get my Summer tan. I've been using this product for the past 3 weeks and I feel burnt and red every time I leave the salon. My skin is also very dry and flaky, I've never had this problem with any other tanning lotion brands before. I also feel like I have to use a lot of it to cover my body. Unfortunately I will be throwing my bottle away and getting a better brand. Not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tanning lotion... be mindful of the bronzing in it!
customer_reviews.text: I used this tanning lotion prior to going in a tanning bed. I highly recommend this product and would purchase again. The smell is great, it was hydrating and I felt the product was fairly priced compared to the other lotions sold in the tanning salon. However, be very careful to apply this evenly! I do not recommend using if you have an event within 1-3 days in case you do not apply evenly. I loved this lotion but many times I would notice that my feet would be streaky since they were generally dryer than the rest of my body so just keep that in mind when applying!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Better than any lotion you can buy at the tanning salon!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of different bronzing lotions and this one is still by far the best! I have spent over a hundred dollars for one bottle of lotion from the tanning salon and this one still beats it! The smell could be better but it’s not strong so I don’t mind it. I am very fair skinned and this is literally the only lotion I have found that will actually tan my skin and doesn’t leave me orange like other bronzing lotions I have tried. This is seriously the best tanning and the fact that it is cheap makes it that much better!
customer_reviews.author: KCorbin

customer_reviews.title: Great producr
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! The bronzer is amazing and works right away. Caution....my fiancé was a first time tanner and he did apply correctly 😀 make sure to evenly apply to skin and wipe hands after application prior to tanning. This is for all bronzers.
customer_reviews.author: Noname

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach tanning!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at purchasing this product at first because so many people said that it’s only good in a tanning bed. I can safely say that this stuff 100% works outside too! First off it smells really good which is a plus, and it moisturizes your skin when you put it on. I lathered it all over myself and in about 30 mins I managed to get 5 shades darker. I would definitely recommend reapplying if you decide to go in the water because it does come off.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Ok this gets you super dark and I do like it, but you have to be extremely careful applying it or it will end up streaked. The only good thing about that is that it comes right off in the shower, the bad thing about that is so does a lot of your tan. It’s still a great product and I do really like it and will likely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: BROOKE MCKINNEY

customer_reviews.title: its a good tan but not great
customer_reviews.text: Initially yes you do get a great tan (using a sunbed) but if you do not consistently top up your tan you will start seeing patches of your skin change in color since when you shower/ scrub everyday more and more of the bronzer comes off (its not a nice look.. uneven skin tone). However I have to say I did not have any bronzer stains or streaks on me or clothes. So only thing is you have to keep topping up your tan to keep the bronzers even. I personally would not buy this again and will stick to products to use in the tanning bed that are bronzer free.
customer_reviews.author: Maoudi

customer_reviews.title: Must have gotten a bad batch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tanning lotion last year and LOVED IT! After two tanning sessions I was super dark! So I bought it again this year! I am on week two of tanning every day and it seems like I am barley getting a tan! My friend bought a cheap bottle at Walmart and she is on DAY TWO and she is super dark! Sending it back!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: I’m black
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a lotion that has helped me develop a tan SO quickly and I only go 3 times a week. I see results later in the day as it seems to develop as more time goes on. Even though this has an “instant bronzer” this is not a self tanner that washes off and fades away. I have developed a deep tan by the first week, genuinely in disbelief at how well this works. Smell is mild, not bothersome. I personally use a self tanning mitt when I apply this for easy application and it works well, no streaking or orange color. This is my new lotion no need to buy a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Streaky tanning lotion. Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this tanning lotion left streaks all over my body & my husbands even though we thoroughly rubbed it on. Definitely stay away from this one. The scent was not bad, but nothing to write home about. Next time I will try the single use packets before committing.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

product_meta.title: Millennium Tanning Products: Dark Tanning Lotion, 100x, 13.5 Fl Oz
product_meta.description: Size:13.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Millennium Tanning Products: Dark Tanning Lotion, 100x, 13.5 Fl Oz
feature_bullets: Product Action: Tan Enhancer, Silicone Bronzer ;

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
